sourcesContent:
<ion-header>
  <ion-toolbar>
    <ion-title>Recuperar Contraseña</ion-title>
    <ion-buttons slot="end">
      <ion-button (click)="dismiss()">Cerrar</ion-button>
    </ion-buttons>
  </ion-toolbar>
</ion-header>

<ion-content>
  <form (ngSubmit)="sendRecoveryEmail()">
    <ion-item>
      <ion-label position="floating">Correo Electrónico</ion-label>
      <ion-input [(ngModel)]="email" name="email" required></ion-input>
    </ion-item>
    <ion-button expand="full" type="submit" style="background-color: #D1117E; color: white;">Enviar</ion-button>
  </form>
</ion-content>
